Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Welcome to Maharani Weddings At Maharani Weddings, we believe that every bride deserves the fairytale wedding of her dreams! Here at MaharaniWeddings.com you will find glittering seeds of inspiration for every aspect of your upcoming wedding. In addition to profiling some of the most spectacular Indian weddings from around the globe through interviews, pictures, and videos, we also hand-pick and share a list of the best Indian wedding vendors in our Maharani Weddings Platinum Guide. From event planners to photographers, dj's, florists, cinematographers, make
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | up artists, mehndi artists, you name it... you’ll find connections to every resource you could ever need for all your wedding ceremonies and celebrations. Galloway, NJ Gujarati Wedding by Bhowmik Dave Films & Photography November 11, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments When elegance meets pure joy, you get a wedding like Maghavi & Kevin’s—yes, you read that right, and no, your eyes aren’t playing tricks on you. The two shared not just a name but an undeniable spark that set the tone for one of the most vibrant celebrations we’ve seen this season. The festivities began at the Holy Trinity Greek Orthodox Church , where guests were welcomed by a burst of color, music, and the kind of energy that only a South Asian sangeet can deliver. Vibe District kept the beats lively with their signature flair
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | —because no desi celebration is complete without a dance floor packed from wall to wall! Their seamless transition from DJ to live music proved why they’re one of the top names in luxury wedding entertainment. As the wedding weekend unfolded, the couple chose The Carriage House to host both their ceremony and reception—a venue that blends timeless architecture with warm sophistication. The grand façade and pristine lawns provided the perfect backdrop for their vows, while the reception that followed was nothing short of a floral fantasy. Mandap Milap , true artisans of floral and décor, transformed the space into a fragrant dream of soft blushes, gold accents, and ethereal mandaps that seemed to float under the chandeliers. The artistry was so precise it felt like every petal had been plac
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ed with intention—and probably was. Guests were treated to the culinary delights of Rasoi Caterers , where every bite told a story of spice, heritage, and heart. From appetizers to dessert, the menu was a flavorful journey through India’s regional richness. The stunning cake, crafted in-house by The Carriage House , was the perfect sweet finale, as visually elegant as it was delicious. Every moment was captured through the lens of Bhowmik Dave Films & Photography , who didn’t just document the wedding—they narrated it. From emotional glances during the ceremony to those stolen giggles during the couple’s portraits, their work proves once again why they are masters at transforming fleeting moments into eternal memories. To round out the evening, Folk’n Guys and Vibe District serenaded guest
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | s with live music that elevated the entire atmosphere into something truly magical. The mix of contemporary and classical tones wrapped the night in a melody of celebration that no one wanted to end. Maghavi & Kevin's wedding wasn’t just about love—it was about laughter, legacy, and a community coming together to witness two souls start their forever in grand style. Come back for more weddings that blend cultural heritage with modern glam. Enjoy today's story. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Berlin, NJ Gujarati Wedding by Paperboys November 7, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments When it comes to weddings that radiate joy, elegance, and pure cinematic flair, Nimmi & Maunik’s celebration takes center stage. This New Jersey love story unfold
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ed with a perfect balance of grandeur and heart, wrapped in tradition yet sprinkled with all the contemporary charm one could dream of. From vibrant sangeet vibes to a fairytale ceremony and reception, every detail came together in a way that could only be described as—well— Maharani magic. The festivities began at Rasoi, where the couple hosted a sangeet night so lively, it could have powered a small city. Think dazzling lights, infectious beats, and a crowd that didn’t stop dancing until the DJ packed up—maybe not even then. Platinum Roadshow kept the rhythm alive with a playlist that blended Bollywood classics, Punjabi bangers, and the kind of dance tracks that guarantee sore feet and happy hearts. For the wedding day, Lucien’s Manor served as the stage for a celebration that was both r
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | egal and romantic. With its grand chandeliers and timeless elegance, the venue was transformed into a floral wonderland by Tradition and Trends , who wove together blooms, textures, and tones that mirrored the couple’s radiant personalities. From the mandap draped in soft pastels to the reception décor that shimmered under candlelight, every corner whispered luxury. Behind every flawless moment was Events by Srishti , whose expertise turned Nimmi & Maunik’s dreams into reality. Known for their refined design aesthetic and impeccable coordination, Srishti’s team ensured that every transition—from baraat to banquet—was seamless. Their signature touch? Turning logistical precision into something that feels like pure artistry. They didn’t just plan a wedding; they orchestrated an experience wh
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ere every guest felt like part of the couple’s love story. Nimmi’s bridal glow was next-level, thanks to Maryam Asim Beauty , who crafted looks that were both ethereal and effortlessly glamorous. Her mehndi, delicately designed by Alfaaz Henna , completed the look with traditional patterns that carried deep meaning—and probably caused more than a few “wow”s from admiring guests. Speaking of artistry, the visual magic was captured to perfection by Paperboys , whose cinematography elevated storytelling to new heights. Every frame reflected emotion and the unfiltered joy of families celebrating love. The team’s creative eye transformed real moments into timeless art, proving once again why their name has become synonymous with breathtaking wedding visuals. Culinary excellence came courtesy of
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | Benares Catering , whose flavorful spread brought together the comfort of home-style Indian cuisine with the sophistication of fine dining. And let’s not forget Platinum Roadshow’s electrifying baraat performance—because nothing quite says “we’re getting married!” like a groom dancing his way to the mandap surrounded by cheering family and friends. To keep every special detail preserved beyond the day, RishCreations24 worked its magic behind the scenes, curating share-worthy content that captured the essence of every laugh, hug, and heartfelt glance. In the end, Nimmi & Maunik’s wedding was a day where love wasn’t just witnessed, but felt by everyone lucky enough to be there. Still daydreaming about this swoon-worthy celebration? Follow us for more breathtaking weddings. STYLE GUIDE style
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | Traditional Romantic Contemporary season Spring color Planning & Design: Events By Srishti | Event Designer: Events By Srishti | Sangeet Venue: Rasoi | Ceremony & Reception Venue: Luciens Manor | Floral & Decor: Tradition and Trends | Hair & Makeup: Maryam Asim Beauty | Catering: Benares Catering | DJ: Platinum Roadshow | Baraat: Platinum Roadshow | Cinematography: Paperboys | Photography: Paperboys | Mehndi Artist: Alfaaz Henna | Content Creator: RishCreations24 Events By Srishti is a member of the Platinum Guide. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: MGM National Harbor: Redefining Wedding Elegance November 6, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Com
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ments From mehndi to mandap, sangeet to reception, a South Asian wedding is a layered, colorful tapestry of moments—and it deserves a venue that understands not just scale, but soul. That’s exactly what MGM National Harbor offers: a setting where tradition and elegance intertwine, in the heart of the National Harbor on the Potomac. Why South Asian Couples Are Choosing MGM 1. Versatile Event Spaces for Every Occasion Whether you're planning an intimate haldi or a grand reception, MGM National Harbor offers flexible indoor and outdoor venues that can accommodate large groups of guests. Their state-of-the-art meeting and event spaces give couples the freedom to segment and personalize each day’s celebration. For show-stopping grandeur, the MGM Grand Ballroom provides soaring ceilings and expa
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | nsive design possibilities. Outdoor terraces and plazas overlooking the harbor or river bring in natural beauty—and unforgettable photo backdrops. 2. In-House Expertise & Multicultural Menus One of MGM’s standout features is its commitment to multicultural menus —ideal for couples who wish to weave traditional flavors and regional specialties into their wedding feast. Their chefs collaborate with couples and planners to customize menus that satisfy older guests and younger palates alike. 3. Seamless Planning, All Under One Roof MGM National Harbor is a full-service resort. That means your wedding, guest accommodations, and guest entertainment can all happen in one place. Their packages include: On-site catering and services Spa and salon services for brides, grooms, and families Assistance
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | in coordinating vendor logistics, décor layout, and day-of flow 4. Comfort, Luxury & Guest Experience Your guests will be treated to luxury hotel rooms , including suites and bridal-ready accommodations. The property also offers nightlife options, dining by acclaimed chefs, a theater, and entertainment—making it more than just a wedding venue, but a destination. Envisioning Your Dream South Asian Wedding Imagine your bridal party getting adorned in a villa-style suite, while guests sip welcome drinks on a terrace that overlooks the shimmering water. The mandap glows under floral chandeliers, and the dance floor pulses with live music. Between the feasts, guests linger in luxe lounges, head to the spa, or explore local attractions—all while your planners and MGM’s experts keep every event
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | flowing on schedule. With experience in hosting diverse weddings, MGM National Harbor combines cultural authenticity, exquisite service, and venue flexibility—so you don’t just get a beautiful wedding, you get a beautiful experience. Start your journey today and let MGM National Harbor turn your wedding dreams into reality. STYLE GUIDE style Sponsored season color Venues: MGM National Harbor MGM National Harbor is a member of the Platinum Guide. Love what you see? Explore their portfolios. COMMENT: FAVORITE: SHARE: TWEET: PIN: Parsippany, NJ Indian Wedding by Jayesh Productions November 6, 2025 Posted by: Shawna Comments When Dimple & Rounak tied the knot, they didn’t just celebrat
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | e a wedding—they threw a full-scale production that blended grandeur, joy, and a sprinkle of cinematic flair. From start to finish, their love story unfolded like a Bollywood romance, complete with swoon-worthy moments, stunning details, and enough laughter to fill a lifetime. The celebrations began at The Excelsior, where the sangeet night set the tone for the days to come. Imagine a dance floor that refused to rest, music that made even the shyest auntie tap her feet, and energy so contagious that you couldn’t help but join in. Mix and Chill Event Group turned the evening into a non-stop party, keeping the beats fresh and the crowd moving all night long. When the big day arrived, Sheraton Parsippany Hotel provided the perfect fairytale setting for the ceremony and reception. With its cas
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | tle-like architecture and elegant ballrooms, the venue felt like something out of a royal dream. Every detail of the event—from the mandap draped in florals to the candlelit reception tables—was pure magic, thanks to the creative vision of All Events Decorators , who transformed the space into an ethereal celebration of love and tradition. And let’s talk about the dream team behind the experience: Vibe District (formerly Kurani Studios)— an absolute powerhouse in South Asian wedding entertainment—handled everything. Planning and design? Impeccable. Lighting and live music? Flawless. DJ and photo booth? Out of this world. Their team orchestrated the celebration with such precision that every moment flowed effortlessly, from the emotional vows to the dance floor takeover. Their rebrand to Vi
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | be District reflects exactly what they bring to every wedding: a vibe so electric, it becomes unforgettable. The couple themselves looked like royalty throughout the weekend. Dimple’s bridal looks from Benbaa and Sequinze were the perfect blend of modern sophistication and timeless elegance, adorned with intricate detailing that shimmered under the lights. Rounak, dapper as ever, donned his tuxedo from F2 Fusion Fashion , complementing his bride with charm and style. The talented Platinum Guide, Dip.Beauty MUA worked her magic with flawless makeup, elegant hairstyles, and mesmerizing mehndi artistry that tied together Dimple’s radiant bridal glow. Her work was truly outstanding. No South Asian wedding feast is complete without flavor-packed cuisine, and Rasoi Catering delivered just that w
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ith an unforgettable menu that satisfied every craving. Sweet endings came courtesy of Calandra’s Bakery , whose decadent creations were as delightful to look at as they were to devour. Behind the lens, Jayesh Productions captured every fleeting emotion and grand gesture with artistic mastery. Their photography and cinematography told Dimple & Rounak’s love story in vivid color and heartfelt detail. Guests arrived and departed in style with Monaco Experiences , ensuring every transition between venues was as smooth as the couple’s first dance. Dimple & Rounak’s wedding was more than just an event—it was an experience bursting with beauty, laughter, and emotion. It reminded everyone present that the best love stories aren’t written in books; they’re danced, sung, and celebrated with the peo
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/ | ple who mean the mos t. Come back for more love stories, breathtaking wedding inspiration, and behind-the-scenes magic. Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Indian Wedding Vendors The complexity of Indian wedding ceremonies and celebrations makes assembling the right combination of vendors an absolute must! You want everything to go off without a hitch on your big day so you truly need to be able to rely on the best stylists, designers, caterers, DJs, mehndi artists, photographers, bartenders, you name it. It’s no easy feat coordinating all the services, contracts, and timelines for each and every vendor, even for the savviest Maharani bride, and that’s why we are here to help. Here, we are on a mission to h
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/indian-wedding-vendors | elp every bride make the fairytale wedding of her dreams come to life! Whether you are blending a fusion of cultures in an American Indian wedding or embracing a more traditional route sprinkled with myriad time-honored Indian wedding rituals, the Maharani Weddings' Platinum Guide is the premium resource for vendors in every category imaginable - from planning and design to cinematography, floral and decor, bridal fashion, hair and makeup, catering, and so much more. The top-rated vendors found in our guide are carefully selected for their experience with the many unique Indian wedding traditions and customs of South Asian culture. And unlike other wedding sites, we only feature a specially chosen group of indian wedding vendors who are pre-screened for their exemplary experience, service,
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/indian-wedding-vendors | and reputation with clients. In addition to soaking up all the glamorous and vibrant Indian wedding ideas and inspiration you can in our world-class Maharani Weddings’ Platinum Guide, you can also browse our exclusive list of vendors below. Simply filter your search by category, location, or both, and voilà! You’ll be well on your way to planning your dream wedding in no time. read more close SEARCH VENDORS US Location International Location CATEGORY Select Category Accomodations Baraat Bridal Cleaning and Preservation Bridal Fashions Bridal Jewelry Cakes & Treats Catering Cinematography Destination Weddings DJ Draping/Styling Favors Floral & Decor Hair & Makeup Honeymoon Invitations & Wedding Stationery Lighting Live Music Live Painting Mehndi Artists Men's Formalwear & Tuxedos Photo Boo

Login with Facebook Submit a wedding REAL WEDDINGS WEDDING IDEAS FILMS CERTIFIED VENDORS VENDOR GUIDE GALLERY THE MAGAZINE Certified Indian Wedding Vendors The complexity of Indian wedding ceremonies and celebrations makes assembling the right combination of vendors an absolute must! You want everything to go off without a hitch on your big day so you truly need to be able to rely on the best stylists, designers, caterers, DJs, mehndi artists, photographers, bartenders, you name it. It’s no easy feat coordinating all the services, contracts, and timelines for each and every vendor, even for the savviest Maharani bride, and that’s why we are here to help. Here, we are on a mi
SRC:WEB https://www.maharaniweddings.com/certified-indian-wedding-vendors | ssion to help every bride make the fairytale wedding of her dreams come to life! Whether you are blending a fusion of cultures in an American Indian wedding or embracing a more traditional route sprinkled with myriad time-honored Indian wedding rituals, the Maharani Weddings' Platinum Guide is the premium resource for vendors in every category imaginable - from planning and design to cinematography, floral and decor, bridal fashion, hair and makeup, catering, and so much more. The top-rated vendors found in our guide are carefully selected for their experience with the many unique Indian wedding traditions and customs of South Asian culture. And unlike other wedding sites, we only feature a specially chosen group of indian wedding vendors who are pre-screened for their exemplary experience

In addition to soaking up all the glamorous and vibrant Indian wedding ideas and inspiration you can in our world-class Maharani Weddings’ Platinum Guide, you can also browse our exclusive list of vendors below.
